Soulfire.name: Soulfire
Soulfire.flavor: You call upon primal spirits of flame to wreathe your target in white-hot fire.
Soulfire.trigger: You or an ally in the burst scores a critical hit with an attack
Soulfire.effect: Until the end of the target’s next turn, the target gains a +2 power bonus to speed, a +2 power bonus to Reflex, and deals extra fire damage equal to your Wisdom modifier each time he or she hits with an attack.

Soul Flare.name: Soul Flare
Soul Flare.flavor: Fiery spirits surround and pierce through your enemies, then pour into an ally. Your compatriot’s eyes glow with white-hot brilliance as waves of heat emanate from his or her body.
Soul Flare.effect: You use your soulfire power on one ally in the burst as a free action.

Spirit Detonation.name: Spirit Detonation
Spirit Detonation.flavor: Your spirit companion explodes in a wave of fiery spirits, burning your enemies and empowering your allies.
Spirit Detonation.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier fire damage. If a creature under the effect of your soulfire power is within the burst, this attack instead deals 4d10 + Wisdom modifier fire damage.

Soul Furnace.name: Soul Furnace
Soul Furnace.flavor: The air around your allies erupts in licking fire, scorching any enemy that dares to come too close.
Soul Furnace.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn or enters a square adjacent to a creature affected by your soulfire power takes fire damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.
